pages.text: "An advanced form of linear energy transfer that utilizes an extremely collimated beam of light."$(p)I mean, it's a laser. What'd you expect?$(p)The laser consumes power to fire a deadly beam of laser. The laser beam can break any breakable blocks, that includes

obsidian. $(p)Water will not obstruct the laser. Any items will also get incinerated if it falls into the path of the laser beam.$(p)The Laser is also used to jumpstart a Fusion Reactor.$(p)Note: do $(bold)NOT$() stand in the path of a laser beam. If you do, the least your worries will be that you are on fire.
